explains: adj. 显要的，值得注意的；非常成功的，令人尊敬的

sentences.en: His eyes are his most notable feature.
sentences.cn: 他的双眼是他最明显的特征。

sentences.en: According to this study, women have made notable gains at the expense of men.
sentences.cn: 根据这项研究，女性以牺牲男性的利益为代价而取得了显著收益。

sentences.en: The proposed new structure is notable not only for its height, but for its shape.
sentences.cn: 那座提议的新建筑值得注意，不仅因其高度，还因其外形。
